titleStmt.title: A view of many errors and som gross absurdities in the old translation of the Psalms in English metre; as also in som other translations lately published: shewing how the Psalms ought to be translated, to be acceptable and edifying. Together with sundry epigramms and suffrages of many godly and learned men in behalf of the author's translation, and reasons for publishing the same. / By W.B. M.A. and minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Barton, William, 1598?-1678.

titleStmt.title: A view of many errors and som gross absurdities in the old translation of the Psalms in English metre; as also in som other translations lately published: shewing how the Psalms ought to be translated, to be acceptable and edifying. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.D. and are to be sold by F. Eglesfield and Thomas Vnderhill in Paul's Church-yard; and F. Tyton, at the three Daggers neer the Temple in Fleet-street.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Novemb 6"; "I" has been added to the imprint date.
